author: gcolvin
content: Politicking this is more than mildly worrisome to me, but I don't want to get into that meta-issue.  My main point is that saving a byte or so in the size of contracts is truly irrelevant.  Issues involving SELFDESTRUCT, syncing and such probably are, but I'd need more time and long-form analysis to get clear on them.  I'm glad to see the authors of the relevant EIPs here, and trust them to get it right in the end.
